Name: Prototype app
Type: Lab
Due Date: January 6, 2023
Description: Similar to the example "Inventory app" prototype, build your own prototype for a more specific inventory-keeping application of your own design. Your prototype designs aren't final, but they should look close to the way you intend the app to ultimately look.
